# MCPVOT x402 V2 Intelligence Network

> **The Premier AI Agent Platform on Base Blockchain**
> Pay $1 USDC â†’ Get 69,420 VOT + Custom IPFS Site

MCPVOT is an x402-protocol compliant intelligence network providing real-time analytics, NFT minting, and IPFS site creation for AI agents on Base Mainnet. All APIs are gasless - facilitator pays gas for seamless AI agent integration.

## ðŸš€ VOT BUILDER - AI Agent Service ($1 USDC)

**NEW!** Create your decentralized web3 presence with the VOT Builder service!

### VOT Builder Details
- **Price**: $1.00 USDC
- **Reward**: 69,420 VOT tokens sent to your wallet
- **Bonus**: +10,000 VOT share bonus (FIP-2) = 79,420 VOT total
- **Deliverable**: Custom animated SVG site pinned to IPFS (permanent)
- **Templates**: 100+ templates across 10 categories
- **Storage**: Free permanent storage via Web3.Storage
- **Standard**: ERC-4804 compatible (web3:// URLs)

### VOT Builder API Endpoint
```
POST https://mcpvot.xyz/api/x402/mint-builder-nft
Body: {
  "userAddress": "0x...",
  "ensName": "optional.eth",
  "baseName": "optional.base.eth", 
  "farcasterFid": 12345,
  "template": "mcpvot"
}
Payment: $1.00 USDC via x402 permit
Response: {
  "success": true,
  "svgCid": "Qm...",
  "metadataCid": "Qm...",
  "votSent": "69420000000000000000000",
  "siteUrl": "https://ipfs.io/ipfs/Qm..."
}
```

### Template Categories
| Category | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| vot | VOT ecosystem themed |
| maxx | MAXX token themed |
| warplet | Warplet NFT themed |
| mcpvot | MCPVOT intelligence themed |
| base | Base chain themed |
| farcaster | Farcaster social themed |
| ens | ENS identity themed |
| defi | DeFi analytics themed |
| gaming | Gaming/metaverse themed |
| minimal | Clean minimal design |

## ðŸ¦– BEEPER NFT - $0.25 USDC

Mint your BEEPER NFT - the mascot of the x402 V2 ecosystem!

### Beeper NFT Details
- **Price**: $0.25 USDC
- **Reward**: 69,420 VOT tokens
- **Standard**: ERC-1155 with IPFS + ERC-4804
- **Rarity**: VRF-determined (10 tiers)

### Mint Beeper NFT API
```
POST https://mcpvot.xyz/api/beeper/mint-with-payment
Body: { "walletAddress": "0x...", "fid": 12345, "ensName": "you.eth" }
Payment: $0.25 USDC via x402 permit
```

## x402scan Discovery

This service is registered on x402scan.com:
- `vot-builder` - $1.00 USDC - IPFS Site + 69,420 VOT
- `beeper-nft-mint` - $0.25 USDC - NFT + 69,420 VOT  
- `clanker-intelligence` - $0.05 USDC - Clanker/Base token analysis (NEW!)
- `ecosystem-intelligence` - $0.02 USDC - Real-time ecosystem metrics (NEW!)
- `multi-token-intelligence` - $0.10 USDC - Analyze 5 tokens at once (NEW!)
- `vot-buy-1usd` - $1.00 USDC - VOT tokens
- `maxx-buy-1usd` - $1.00 USDC - MAXX + 10K VOT bonus

## ðŸ§  INTELLIGENCE APIs - NEW x402 PAID SERVICES

### Clanker Token Intelligence ($0.05)
Analyze ANY Clanker or Base ecosystem token with comprehensive data:
```
GET https://mcpvot.xyz/api/x402/intelligence/clanker?symbol=DEGEN
or
GET https://mcpvot.xyz/api/x402/intelligence/clanker?address=0x4ed4E...
Payment: $0.05 USDC via x402 permit
Response: {
  "token_symbol": "DEGEN",
  "market_data": { price, volume, liquidity, market_cap },
  "social_intelligence": { mentions, sentiment, engagement },
  "intelligence_summary": { recommendations, risk_level }
}
```

### Ecosystem Intelligence ($0.02)
Real-time MCPVOT ecosystem metrics:
```
GET https://mcpvot.xyz/api/x402/intelligence/ecosystem
Payment: $0.02 USDC via x402 permit
Response: {
  "burns": { total_burned, burn_count },
  "trading": { volume, success_rate },
  "ecosystem": { status, active_streams }
}
```

### Multi-Token Analysis ($0.10)
Analyze up to 5 tokens in one query - 50% savings!
```
POST https://mcpvot.xyz/api/x402/intelligence/multi
Body: { "symbols": ["CLANKER", "DEGEN", "VOT", "HIGHER", "BUILD"] }
Payment: $0.10 USDC via x402 permit
```

## ERC-4804 / ERC-8004 Compliance

- **ERC-4804**: web3:// URLs for decentralized content
- **ERC-8004**: AI agent registration and discovery
- **IPFS**: Permanent storage via Web3.Storage

## Quick Start for Agents

### 1. Check Service Info (Free)
```
GET https://mcpvot.xyz/api/x402/mint-builder-nft
```

### 2. Create Your IPFS Site ($1 USDC)
```
POST https://mcpvot.xyz/api/x402/mint-builder-nft
Body: { "userAddress": "0xYourWallet", "template": "mcpvot" }
```

### 3. x402 Discovery Endpoint
```
GET https://mcpvot.xyz/api/x402
```

## Pricing Summary

| Service | Price | VOT Reward | What You Get |
|---------|-------|------------|--------------|
| Clanker Intelligence | $0.05 | - | Token market + social analysis |
| Ecosystem Intelligence | $0.02 | - | Real-time ecosystem metrics |
| Multi-Token Analysis | $0.10 | - | Bulk 5-token analysis (50% off) |
| VOT Builder | $1.00 | 69,420 VOT | IPFS Site + VOT |
| Beeper NFT | $0.25 | 69,420 VOT | NFT + VOT |
| Buy $1 VOT | $1.00 | Market Rate | VOT Tokens |
| Buy $1 MAXX | $1.00 | 10K bonus | MAXX + VOT |
| Burn Stats | FREE | - | Transparency endpoint |

## Documentation Links

- **API Docs**: https://mcpvot.xyz/docs/api
- **MCP Manifest**: https://mcpvot.xyz/.well-known/mcp-manifest.json
- **Agent Registration**: https://mcpvot.xyz/.well-known/agent-registration.json
- **x402scan Listing**: https://x402scan.com/resource/mcpvots
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/MCPVOT

## Token Addresses (Base Mainnet)

- **VOT Token**: `0xc1e1E7aDfDf1553b339D8046704e8e37E2CA9B07`
- **MAXX Token**: `0xFB7a83abe4F4A4E51c77B92E521390B769ff6467`
- **USDC**: `0x833589fCD6eDb6E08f4c7C32D4f71b54bdA02913`
- **Treasury**: `0x824ea259C1e92f0c5dC1d85dcbb80290B90BE7fa` (mcpvot.base.eth)

## Architecture

- **Frontend**: Next.js 15 + Tailwind CSS + Three.js
- **Backend**: Vercel Edge Functions + ethers.js
- **Blockchain**: Base Mainnet (Chain ID: 8453)
- **Payments**: x402 Protocol with EIP-3009 (TransferWithAuthorization)
- **Data Sources**: GeckoTerminal, DexScreener, Birdeye, Neynar

## Contact

- **Website**: https://mcpvot.xyz
- **Farcaster**: @mcpvot
- **Discord**: https://discord.gg/mcpvots
- **Support**: support@mcpvot.xyz
